Name: Milk & Honey
Ingredients: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Flavoursome Scotch whisky enriched with honey and smoothed with cream.
History: Created in 2002 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Milk & Honey contains 228 calories
